parameters: Long ago the God King Aagosh ruled over 6 lesser Gods.
The Lesser Gods, Veloria, Vulcan, Caldaria, Xeratos,
Mrissa, and Brac rose up in rebellion against Aagosh.
Aagosh banished them to Aagoshia and challenged them
to gather keys in order to ascend the Heaven Tower
You are the Avatar of one of the Lesser Gods.
You must find the keys and assault the tower, and
Only one Avatar can battle Aagosh to become the new
